00083 class CustomGender : public Gender
00084 {
00085     public:
00086 
00097         CustomGender() 
00098             throw()
00099         { 
00100            /*
00101             * Add the name of this class.  Otherwise if I 
00102             * didn't do this I could not call Tag::instanceOf()
00103             * this an instance of this class and get back a true.
00104             */
00105             addInstanceOf("CustomGender");
00106         } 
00107 
00119         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
00120             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00121         {
00122             string returnString("&lt;gender&gt;");
00123             StringPimpl s = InnerTemplateListImpl::getString();
00124             returnString += s.c_str();
00125             returnString += "&lt;/gender&gt;";
00126             return returnString.c_str();
00127         }
00128 };
00129 
00134 class CustomBot : public Bot
00135 {
00136     public:
00137 
00148         CustomBot() 
00149             throw()
00150         { 
00151            /*
00152             * Add the name of this class.  Otherwise if I 
00153             * didn't do this I could not call Tag::instanceOf()
00154             * this an instance of this class and get back a true.
00155             */
00156             addInstanceOf("CustomBot");     
00157         } 
00158 
00170         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
00171             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00172         {
00173             string returnString("&lt;bot name=\"" + m_value + "\"/&gt;");
00174             return returnString.c_str();
00175         }
00176 
00188         virtual void setAttribute(const StringPimpl &name, const StringPimpl &value) 
00189             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00190         {
00191             m_value = value.c_str();
00192         }
00193 
00194     private:
00195 
00199         string m_value;
00200 };

00206 class CustomCondition : public Condition
00207 {
00208     public:
00209 
00220         CustomCondition() 
00221             throw()
00222         { 
00223            /*
00224             * Add the name of this class.  Otherwise if I 
00225             * didn't do this I could not call Tag::instanceOf()
00226             * this an instance of this class and get back a true.
00227             */
00228             addInstanceOf("CustomCondition");       
00229         } 
00230         
00238         virtual void add(InnerTemplate *tag) 
00239             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00240         {
00241             m_list.add(tag);
00242         }
00243 
00255         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
00256             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00257         {
00258             string returnString("&lt;condition");
00259 
00260             if(!m_name.empty())
00261             {
00262                 returnString += " name=\"" + m_name + "\"";
00263             }
00264             
00265             if(!m_value.empty())
00266             {
00267                 returnString += " value=\"" + m_value + "\"";
00268             }
00269             
00270             returnString += "&gt;";
00271             returnString += m_list.getString().c_str();
00272             returnString += "&lt;/condition&gt";
00273             return returnString.c_str();            
00274         }
00275 
00287         virtual void setAttribute(const StringPimpl &name, const StringPimpl &value) 
00288             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00289         {
00290             string stringName(name.c_str());
00291             string stringValue(value.c_str());
00292             
00293             if(stringName == "name")
00294             {
00295                 m_name = stringValue;
00296             }
00297             else if(stringName == "value")
00298             {
00299                 m_value = stringValue;
00300             }
00301         }
00302 
00303     private:
00304 
00310         InnerTemplateListImpl m_list;
00311 
00315         string m_name;
00316 
00320         string m_value;
00321 };

00683 class CustomInput : public Input
00684 {
00685     public:
00686 
00697         CustomInput() 
00698         {
00699            /*
00700             * Add the name of this class.  Otherwise if I 
00701             * didn't do this I could not call Tag::instanceOf()
00702             * this an instance of this class and get back a true.
00703             */
00704             addInstanceOf("CustomInput");
00705         }
00706 
00718         virtual void setAttribute(const StringPimpl &name, const StringPimpl &value) 
00719             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00720         {
00721             string stringValue(value.c_str());
00722             m_value = stringValue;
00723         }
00724 
00736         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
00737             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
00738         {
00739             if(!m_value.empty())
00740             {
00741                 string returnString("&lt;input");
00742                 returnString += " index=\"" + m_value + "\"/&gt;";
00743                 return returnString.c_str();            
00744             }
00745             else
00746             {
00747                 string returnString("&lt;input/&gt;");
00748                 return returnString.c_str();
00749             }
00750 
00751         }
00752 
00753     private:
00754 
00758         string m_value;
00759 };

01456         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
01457             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
01458         {
01459             if(!m_value.empty())
01460             {
01461                 string returnString("&lt;thatstar");

01463                 return returnString.c_str();            
01464             }
01465             else
01466             {
01467                 string returnString("&lt;thatstar/&gt;");
01468                 return returnString.c_str();
01469             }
01470 
01471         }
01472 
01473     private:
01474 
01478         string m_value;
01479 };

01498             * didn't do this I could not call Tag::instanceOf()
01499             * this an instance of this class and get back a true.
01500             */
01501             addInstanceOf("CustomThink");       
01502         }

01515         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
01516             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)

01550             */
01551             addInstanceOf("CustomTopicStar");
01552         }
01553 
01565         virtual void setAttribute(const StringPimpl &name, const StringPimpl &value) 
01566             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
01567         {
01568             string stringValue(value.c_str());
01569             m_value = stringValue;
01570         }
01571 
01583         virtual StringPimpl getString() const
01584             throw(InternalProgrammerErrorException &)
01585         {
01586             if(!m_value.empty())
01587             {
01588                 string returnString("&lt;topicstar");
01589                 returnString += " index=\"" + m_value + "\"/&gt;";
01590                 return returnString.c_str();            
01591             }
01592             else
01593             {
01594                 string returnString("&lt;topicstar/&gt;");
01595                 return returnString.c_str();
01596             }
01597 
01598         }
